channel.title: Help with portals please
channel.description:
Yo guys, i need more DETAILED help with portals, (http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,328858.0.html) i read the guide on tuts but it only helps when they portal is allready there. I tryed adding this code at the end of all the cases
[code]case 2468: teleportToX = 2738; teleportToY = 3473; sendMessage("You teleport to low level train."); break;[/code]
this is the error in compile
[code]./Client.java:5808: orphaned case case 2468: ^
1 error press any key to continue...[/code]
Please help!

item.title: Help with portals please
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:4, topic:280540”]Switch statements explained - By Jc22493

That’ll give you a basis on the meaning of it.[/quote]

Ahh, i now no what a Switch Statement is, but it’s not helping me with Portals, where should i put my switch statement? hmm… Add me on msn? Might be easier

tweezy@hotmail.co.uk

Im on live now.

Read full topic
